msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

SDK-22608 – GraphicElement.rotation should not be bindable since it doesn’t satisfy either of the “bindable requirements” – the property is never set “under the covers” by other framework code and its something not settable by the end-user of the application.

SDK-22631 – Request from Design View. They need a way to distinguish whether the dynamic event, callLaterError, is dispatched from UIComponent or LayoutManager. I added a field on the dynamic event object, source, which refers back to the emitter. Additionally, cleaned up the incorrect copy&pasted comment in LayoutManager.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-22390 - Color transform is incorrectly applied in MXML Graphics
For a component or graphic, specifying a transform without an explicit matrix declaration was overriding the convenience transform properties.
The new behavior is to only apply the transform’s matrix to the component or graphic if it was explicitly specified.
Doc notes: Explain that transform matrix will only apply if explicitly set
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixed 2 areas of effects bugs (playheadTime and transform effects shared instances). Also fixed bug in GraphicElement.localToGlobal(). Fixes remaining transform effects bugs prior to feature signoff.
tests: checkintests mustella spark/effects,mx/effects (run locally and in cyclone by Matt)
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-22046 - Can't set matrix3D property on Transform
Player declares matrix3D setter with * return type. So mx.geom.Transform override must also use *. Note that once the Player is updated with void, this will need to be changed to void.
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-22146 - [CT 2373084] AlphaMultiplier and AlphaOffset in color transformation are ignored in MXML Graphics
Changed the behavior of alpha and ColorTransform for GraphicElement to match the behavior of DisplayObject.
- ColorTransform.alphaMultiplier and alpha are equivalent and are kept in sync.
- ColorTransform.alphaOffset is still applied even if alpha is set.
- mx.geom.Transform sets the colorTransformExplicitlySet flag whenever the colorTransform setter is called
- GraphicElement alpha setter clears the colorTransformExplicitlySet flag whenever it is called
- Setting GraphicElement.transform will update the alpha property with ColorTransform.alphaMultiplier if a colorTransform was explicitly set
- Setting the colorTransform on a mx.geom.Transform that is assigned to a GraphicElement, calls setColorTransform, which updates the alpha property with ColorTransform.alphaMultiplier.
- In commitProperties, the displayObject.alpha is updated only if there is no transform or if colorTransformExplicitlySet is false.
QE Notes: Need tests for combo of alpha and colorTransform alpha props
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixed some transform effects bugs plus a GraphicElement.localToGlobal() bug with the shared display object.
QE Notes: 8 failures in transform effects tests, 1 in Resize test, require changes to the test (new, correct behavior causes a change in the relevantStyles and affectedProperties return values)
Tests: checkintests, Mustella (spark/effects, mx/effects), Catalyst transition test
